character.statement: Me?
Serving?
I don't want them getting too suspicious of me. Best play along for now.
I should leave the tray here.
We made it past them. Let's lose this outfit.
Uh oh.
Everybody into the chute!
You there!
No, the jotunn behind you. Of course, you! Quit loafing and start serving.
Serve the men and women their drinks! Chop chop!
Serve the men and women their drinks! Chop chop!
That guy's an imposter! The prisoners are getting away!
How can I eat my meat without any mead?!
Ugh, finally! About time!
What are you doing?! You have not earned your furs yet.
Not now. Can't you see I'm busy?
Not now. Can't you see I'm busy?
Hail!
The prisoners are getting away!
Obliged. Now be off with you.
Have you heard this one? 'What has six eyes, six arms, six legs, three heads, and a very short life?'
Three people about to be eaten by a dragon.
Interpretive dance?
Can I just get a normal glass instead?
Hail big guy, how goes the feasting?
I wonder if they realize they are telling the same jokes over and over.
Okay, okay. "One tooth to bite, he's the forests foe. One tooth to fight, as all Norse know." What is it?
An axe!
Hmm... I give up.
That looks too heavy for me.
Wait, didn't the big guy already walk by?
They should have grabbed a drink before sitting down.
Eating and joking with friends; this is the life!
Here's a good one. How do vikings communicate?
By norse code!
Ugh, I'm no good at riddles...
